section.name: TODO
section.p: The following is a list of items that need to be completed in Betwixt. Contributions are welcome!.

ul.li: Create a SAXWriter class in the io package that takes a bean and writes to a SAX ContentHandler rather that outputting textual XML like BeanWriter does. This will allow Betwixt to work nicely in XML pipelining environments like Cocoon and Jelly.
Create a W3C DOM implementation that acts as a facade on top of beans to allow beans to be transformed in XSLT engines as XML.
